title: Functional Glycomics of the African Sleeping Sickness Parasite Trypanosoma brucei
abstractText: Mike Ferguson and Geoff Barton are frequently interviewed about drug development against tropical diseases, post-genomics and bioinformatics by local and national newspapers, radio and TV. They also give frequent presentations to school students, Rotary Clubs and other organisations on their research and on the importance of Biomedical Research in a local, national and international context.
